r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block (16 Questions)
1 LEAT_RADIO_1 - In the last working week, did you work in the area where raw hides and skins were tanned?
1A1 LEAT_CHECK_1A1 - What was used as the tanning agent?
2 LEAT_RADIO_2 - In the last working week, did you work in the area where tanned hides and skins were split and shaved?
2A1 LEAT_RADIO_2A1 - Were the hides and skins split or shaved while dry?
3 LEAT_RADIO_3 - In the last working week, did you work in the area where leather was dried, set out, stretched and softened?
4 LEAT_RADIO_4 - In the last working week, did you apply formaldehyde-releasing finishers to the leather?
4A1 LEAT_CHECK_4A1 - How did you apply the leather finisher?
5 LEAT_RADIO_5 - In the last working week, did you sand, grind or buff leather?
5A1 LEAT_RADIO_5A1 - In the last working week, did you use a sanding drum to buff the leather?
6 LEAT_RADIO_6 - In the last working week, did you apply formaldehyde-releasing varnishes to the leather?
6A1 LEAT_CHECK_6A1 - How did you apply the varnish?
7 LEAT_CHECK_7 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
LEAT_7A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
LEAT_7B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
LEAT_7C By a general ventilation system (3)
LEAT_7D By fans in the doorway or windows (4)
LEAT_7E By open doors or windows (5)
LEAT_7F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
8 LEAT_RADIO_8 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection when doing your job?
8A1 LEAT_CHECK_8A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
LEAT_8A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
LEAT_8A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
LEAT_8A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
1 LEAT_aCLH_RADIO_9_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
1A1 LEAT_aCLH_CHECK_9_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?
aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner (2)
End of Start of Block: Default Question Block
